divs: Sighting Details1 answer= mand my dad was comeing back from some wear and we was in his truck and we happen to look over wear a some appartments was and we seen something hovering over top the apperments at first we thought it was a search helicoptor but we was thinking if it wsa a search helicoptor we wouldof heard the blades going on the helicoptor but we didn't we didn't hear no sound so after we drove past the apparments the object started to follow up half way home but by the time me and me dad got home the object was going and never see it again no more after that.
Summary: well it was a circler object
